Uses of Class
Block

    • Uses of Block in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of Block in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bullet
      This class is used to represent a bullet, as it can move through the screen and collide with players or enemies.
      class  Dock
      This class is made to represent a dock on the map which the player can interact and trade at.
      class  Enemy
      This class is used to represent an enemy a player can fight.
      class  Particle
      This class is used to represent small particle effects which do not affect the game but look nice.
      class  Player
      This class is used to represent the user's ship.
